attributes.action: Make supermarkets buy and sell imperfect vegetables to afforfable prices
attributes.additional_details: There is no reason for buyers not to buy imperfect vegetables from farmers. In this case size and shape does not matter! We buy and cook food for the taste and it's outrageous that farmer have to suffer for shops deciding what a carrot should look like. Does it really matter that a carrot has 3 feet -NO! Make farmers' commitment in this country be worth the hard work they put in.
